on the Dan- ube," answered the soldier. Prince Andrew took out his purse and gave the soldier three gold pieces. 
"That's for them all," he said to the officer who came up. 
"Get well soon, lads!" he continued, turn- ing to the soldiers. "There's plenty to do still." 
"What news, sir?" asked the officer, evidently anxious to start a conversation. 
"Good newsl ... Go on!" he shouted to the driver, and they galloped on. 
It was already quite dark when Prince An- drew rattled over the pave
